info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:29PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Berrien County through 1215 AM EDT... At 1128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Buffalo, or 11 miles north of Michigan City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shorewood-Tower Hill around 1140 PM EDT. Bridgman and Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert around 1145 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stevensville, St. Joseph, Fair Plain, Benton Harbor and Benton Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 196 between mile markers 0 and 7. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 4 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
